data.title: Agilik Barrier Series
data.desc: Super intensive brushless barrier from Roger Technology with a 24/7 duty cycle.

data.title: Bionik Barrier
data.desc: The Brushless Bionik 36V DC super intensive barrier has a boom of up to 4 metres and a built-in digital control panel with on board encoder.

data.title: BE20/210 Above Gound Gate Motor
data.desc: Roger Brushless BE20/210 twin gate kit for gates up to 2.2m per wing, 24v, super intensive use, with digital encoder.

data.title: BG30 Sliding Gate Motor Series
data.desc: Roger Technology BG30 sliding gate kit series featuring the latest brushless motor technology and safety.

data.title: BH30 Sliding Gate Motor Series
data.desc: Roger Technology BH30 24V sliding gate kit series featuring the latest brushless motor technology and safety.

data.title: BR21/362 Underground Motor
data.desc: Roger Brushless BR21/362 underground gate kit for gates up to 4m per wing, 24v, super intensive use, with digital encoder.

data.title: SMARTY Above Ground Gate Motor Series
data.desc: The Roger Brushless SMARTY above ground kit series capable of opening a 7m gate leaf, uper intensive use, with digital encoder.

data.title: BM30 BM30/304/HS High Speed
data.desc: Roger Technology BM30/304 24V high speed gate kit featuring the latest Brushless motor technology.
